channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OpenAI asked Trump administration to expand Chips Act tax credit to cover data centers
item.description: A recent letter from OpenAI reveals more details about how the company is hoping the federal government can support the company's ambitious plans for ...

item.title: Is Wall Street losing faith in AI?
item.description: A rough week for tech stocks might signal a loss of investor confidence in artificial intelligence.

item.title: ‘Breaking Bad’ creator’s new show ‘Pluribus’ was emphatically ‘made by humans,’ not AI
item.description: If you watched all the way to the end of the new Apple TV show “Pluribus,” you may have noticed an unusual disclaimer in the credits: “This show was m...

item.title: How startups can lure good talent fairly without big tech bank accounts
item.description: Three industry insiders walk through how startups can set up an employee equity strategy that remains fair as a company grows.

item.title: Rivian gives RJ Scaringe a new pay package worth up to $5B
item.description: The company canceled a similar-sized award from 2021, when EV optimism was sky-high, due to the "unlikeliness" that the associated goals could be met.

item.title: Best Packing Cubes for Every Kind of Trip (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Whether you’re a no-frills backpacker or a bag-checking fashionista, there’s a perfect packing cube out there for you.

item.title: Branch Sale of the Year: Deals on Office Chairs, Standing Desks, and Home Office Gear
item.description: Branch is offering up to 15 percent off sitewide now through December 3.

item.title: Rivian gives RJ Scaringe a new pay package worth up to $5B
item.description: The company canceled a similar-sized award from 2021, when EV optimism was sky-high, due to the "unlikeliness" that the associated goals could be met.

item.title: WIRED-Approved Brooklinen Bedding Is on Sale for a Few Days
item.description: Upgrade your sleep setup with up to 20 percent off some of our favorite bedding essentials.

item.title: The Government Shutdown Is a Ticking Cybersecurity Time Bomb
